Circos plot of molecular marker distribution across chromosomes

Source: R/visualization.R
plot_snp_circos.Rd

Circos plot of molecular marker distribution across chromosomes

plot_snp_circos(genome_ranges, genes_ranges, marker_ranges)

Arguments

genome_ranges

A GRanges object with chromosome lengths.
genes_ranges

A GRanges object with genomic coordinates of all genes in the genome.
marker_ranges

A GRanges object with genomic positions of molecular markers.

Value

A ggplot object with a circos plot of molecular marker distribution across chromosomes.

See also

as.ggplot element_textbox

Examples

load(gwas)

gwas_list <- split(gwas, gwas$trait)
genes_ranges <- maize_gr[maize_gr$type == "gene", ]
p <- plot_snp_circos(chr_length, genes_ranges, gwas_list)
